CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many stages are there in this funnel chart?

SRP.Q: Is the Property Listed stage positioned above or below the Initial Inquiries stage?
SRP.A: The Property Listed stage is positioned {above} the Initial Inquiries stage.

VPR.Q: What pattern does the data reduction follow in this funnel chart?
VPR.A: The data reduction follows a {logarithmic} pattern.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Property Listed?
VE.A: The value of stage Property Listed is {366}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Negotiation?
VE.A: The value of stage Negotiation is {105}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the highest value is Property Listed, with a value of {366}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the lowest value is Post-sale Survey, with a value of {48}.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Property Viewed to stage Negotiation?
SC.A: Decreased by {54} Properties from stage Property Viewed to stage Negotiation.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Initial Inquiries to stage Property Viewed?
SC.A: Decreased by {76} Properties from stage Initial Inquiries to stage Property Viewed.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value exceed 132? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Property Listed} stage has {366}, the {Initial Inquiries} stage has {235}, the {Property Viewed} stage has {159}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall below 61? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Sale Closed} stage has {59}, the {Post-sale Survey} stage has {48}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall between 61 and 132? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Negotiation} stage has {105}, the {Contract Signed} stage has {63}.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Property Viewed to Negotiation, or from stage Contract Signed to Sale Closed?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Property Viewed} to {Negotiation} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is the greatest: from stage Sale Closed to Post-sale Survey, from stage Initial Inquiries to Property Viewed, or from stage Contract Signed to Sale Closed?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Initial Inquiries} to stage {Property Viewed} is the greatest.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the largest?
MSR.A: The largest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Property Listed} and {Initial Inquiries} stages.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the smallest?
MSR.A: The smallest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Contract Signed} and {Sale Closed} stages.
